name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goku Falling Stars - Dragon Ball New Tab Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the magic of Goku under falling stars with this captivating new tab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the magic of Goku under falling stars with this captivating new tab extension.

This Chrome extension fills your new tab page with breathtaking artwork of Goku, surrounded by falling stars, evoking the wonder and power of Dragon Ball. With each new tab, enjoy stunning visuals that capture Gokuâ€™s adventurous spirit and the awe-inspiring moments of the series. The extension also features motivational quotes, reminding you to aim high and chase your dreams, just like Goku.

Whether you're a fan of his incredible battles or the peaceful moments of his journey, this extension brings Goku's essence to your browser. Every time you open a new tab, feel the excitement of his limitless potential under the stars.

Transform your browsing experience with Goku and the falling stars, and let his strength and perseverance inspire you every day.
